target.description: Target directory path (relative or absolute) where AI tool configs will be deployed

tools.description: List of AI coding tools to generate configurations for

mode.description: Deployment mode: 'local' for automatic deployment, 'manual' for instructions only

backup.description: Whether to backup existing files before deploying

auto_commit.description: Automatically commit changes to git (requires mode: local and git repository)

git_branch.description: Git branch name to use for auto-commit (optional)
